Text: The CD release contains 5 songs (one the end of disk 1) that did not appear on the first vinyl.

eh, my bad...  the wiki says the new songs are on the end of disk 2...

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/P.E.A.C.E./War
thank you very much for uploading a classic peace of hc, great compilation!

No Problem.  Funny story...  I bought the original vinyl for this when it came out and my copy had no insert.  I carried around those 2 albums for 15 years not knowing who some of the artists were.  I was about to rip the vinyl when I discovered the CDs with the 5 bonus songs.
Thanx a lot! Lots of great songs and I found some new bands I want to hear more from. Love italian HC - No mai!
thanks for the share, i'll check this out!
